newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: U.S. Fluor Daniel appoints North Asia president.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Fluor Daniel appoints North Asia president.

text.p: Fluor Daniel, the principal subsidiary of U.S.-based construction and engineering company Fluor Corp, has appointed James Smith president of its North Asia business, a company statement said on Monday.
Smith was formerly vice-president for Southeast Asia, responsible for business development.
Over the next two years Flour Daniel will complete 16 projects in China and was recently awarded the contract to build the main passenger terminal for the new Inchon airport in South Korea.
The statement did not say where Smith would be based.
